dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, so, you know how we always talk about Hollywood salaries? Like, who's actually making the *real* money these days?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, so, you know how we always talk about Hollywood salaries? Like, who's actually making the real money these days?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah. Always curious about those, uh, big paychecks. Especially with all the changes in the industry, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah. Always curious about those, uh, big paychecks. Especially with all the changes in the industry, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. I was just reading this article, and, um, it's pretty wild. Apparently, Hollywood still has its big-money brands, even if the old "twenty-twenty deal" for guys like Harrison Ford is mostly gone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. I was just reading this article, and, um, it's pretty wild. Apparently, Hollywood still has its big-money brands, even if the old twenty-twenty deal for guys like Harrison Ford is mostly gone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While the lucrative twenty-twenty deal ($20 million upfront and 20% of gross profit) doled out to the likes of Harrison Ford and Tom Cruise may be more or less gone, Hollywood still has its big-money brands, those actors who can promise an audience so big that they command not only an eight-figure salary to show up on set but also a decent chunk of a films nebulous poolor the money left over after some but not all of the bills are paid.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, like, the guaranteed huge upfronts. So, who's, uh, who's at the top of the heap now? Any guesses?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, like, the guaranteed huge upfronts. So, who's, uh, who's at the top of the heap now? Any guesses?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I mean, it *has* to be The Rock, right? Dwayne Johnson?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I mean, it has to be The Rock, right? Dwayne Johnson?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ding, ding, ding! You got it. He pulled in, like, almost $90 million between 2018 and 2019. Can you even imagine that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ding, ding, ding! You got it. He pulled in, like, almost ninety million dollars between twenty eighteen and twenty nineteen. Can you even imagine that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Dwayne Johnson, also known as the Rock, tops the Forbes list of the worlds ten highest-paid actors, collecting $89.4 million between June 1, 2018, and June 1, 2019.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa. Eighty-nine point four million? That's insane. And, uh, he always talks about putting the audience first. "What does the audience want?" Seems to be working for him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa. Eighty-nine point four million? That's insane. And, uh, he always talks about putting the audience first. What does the audience want? Seems to be working for him.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Dwayne Johnson, also known as the Rock, tops the Forbes list of the worlds ten highest-paid actors, collecting $89.4 million between June 1, 2018, and June 1, 2019. ... It has to be audience first. What does the audience want, and what is the best scenario that we can create that will send them home happy? Johnson told Forbes in 2018.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really does. He's got this deal that's, like, as close to that old twenty-twenty as you can get. Up to $23.5 million upfront for Jumanji, plus 15% of the back-end!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really does. He's got this deal that's, like, as close to that old twenty-twenty as you can get. Up to twenty three point five million dollars upfront for Jumanji, plus fifteen percent of the back-end!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Johnson has landed a pay formula as close to the famed twenty-twenty deal of yore as any star can get these days. Hell collect an upfront salary of up to $23.5 millionhis highest quote yetfor the forthcoming Jumanji: The Next Level. He also commands up to 15% of the pool from high-grossing franchise movies, including Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, which had a worldwide box office of $962.1 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and then you have guys like Robert Downey Jr.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and then you have guys like Robert Downey Junior.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Oh, RDJ! Avengers money, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, R D J! Avengers money, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! He got, like, $200 million upfront for Iron Man, and nearly 8% of the pool for *Endgame*. That amounted to, uh, about $75 million just for that movie alone!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! He got, like, two hundred million dollars upfront for Iron Man, and nearly eight percent of the pool for Endgame. That amounted to, uh, about seventy five million dollars just for that movie alone!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Robert Downey Jr. gets $20 million upfront and nearly 8% of the pool for his role as Iron Man, and that amounted to about $55 million for his work in Avengers: Endgame, which grossed $2.796 billion at the box office.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seventy-five million for one film! No wonder he's, like, just chilling now. And that *Endgame* money really boosted a lot of people, didn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seventy-five million for one film! No wonder he's, like, just chilling now. And that Endgame money really boosted a lot of people, didn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Robert Downey Jr. gets $20 million upfront and nearly 8% of the pool for his role as Iron Man, and that amounted to about $55 million for his work in Avengers: Endgame...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Chris Hemsworth, Paul Rudd, even Bradley Cooper. Though Cooper's story is, uh, pretty unique.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Chris Hemsworth, Paul Rudd, even Bradley Cooper. Though Cooper's story is, uh, pretty unique.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That gross was so big that it secured spots on this years top-earner list for Chris Hemsworth, Bradley Cooper and Paul Rudd, in addition to Downey; together, they earned $284 million, with most of that coming from the franchise.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. He forfeited any upfront salary for *A Star Is Born*, like, for himself and Lady Gaga. It was a passion project for him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. He forfeited any upfront salary for A Star Is Born, like, for himself and Lady Gaga. It was a passion project for him.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The movie was a passion project for Cooper, and he forfeited any upfront salary to go into the film and Gagas salary.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. That's, uh, some serious belief in your work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. That's, uh, some serious belief in your work.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And it paid off big time! The movie grossed $435 million, and he ended up with an estimated $40 million from it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it paid off big time! The movie grossed four hundred thirty five million dollars, and he ended up with an estimated forty million dollars from it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The movie, which had a production budget of only $36 million, grossed $435 million worldwide, leaving Cooper with an estimated $40 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's, like, a huge win. So, uh, who else made the very top of that list, besides The Rock and RDJ?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's, like, a huge win. So, uh, who else made the very top of that list, besides The Rock and R D J?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Chris Hemsworth was actually number two, with, like, $76.4 million. RDJ was number three at $66 million. So, all these guys are just, you know, raking it in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Chris Hemsworth was actually number two, with, like, seventy six point four million dollars. R D J was number three at sixty six million dollars. So, all these guys are just, you know, raking it in.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 3. Robert Downey Jr. Earnings: $66 million 2. Chris Hemsworth Earnings: $76.4 million

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Incredible. It just goes to show you, if you can bring the audience in, Hollywood will, uh, definitely pay up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Incredible. It just goes to show you, if you can bring the audience in, Hollywood will, uh, definitely pay up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely.
